entry.tran: （语言）夸张的，文绉绉的，矫揉造作的
entry.def: High-flown language is very grand, formal, or literary.

example.ex: It is highly probable that many of the Service's personnel were put off by such high-flown rhetoric.
example.tran: 很可能该部门的许多工作人员都对这种华而不实的虚夸言辞感到反感。

auth_sentence.content: Such highflown display is now the only mode of self-expression open to her.
auth_sentence.res_content: Such highflown display is now the only mode of self-expression open to her.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Such highflown display is now the only mode of self-expression open to her.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
